name: Out of the Box (itch) (MrMadCat)
description:
A short game made for Ludum Dare 45.

Theme: Start with nothing

In the beginning there was Nothing.  

Then there was... A Box! And in the Box... A Cat!

Because what is better than a cat?

Anyways, there is still no level, so go and unlock parts of the level by collecting shiny orbs.

Also cardboard boxes are super fun. And give you new abilities, so jump into them. (They are mostly for fun though, right?)

   

Controls:

Move with arrow keys or WASD.

Jumpwith Up arrow or Space.

Scratch Mice by using left control.

Technlogy used:
Unity, Krita

Team:
- Programming: Johannes Alef, Rebecca Schieren-Alef
- Art: Rebecca Schieren-Alef

Music:
- Hong Linh Thai and Koucha123 (https://soundcloud.com/koucha123)
- Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Sneaky Snitch" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
